name: Kaide and the Bloody Sacrifices
description:
Controls:

  • WASD Keys to move
  • Left Click to fire projectiles
  • E key to interact

Play as Kaide a spirit forced to fight for his survival against waves of enemies, fuse their souls into your own and offer your bloody soul to the devil and obtain even more power.

Objective:

  • Kill enemies to restore your HP, if you have full HP your max HP will increase instead.
  • Offer your max HP to the devil for power-ups.
  • Kill to collect as many points as possible.

Creators:

- Philip "Kritz" - Team Lead, Coder, Additional Artist
- Bryan "Guilty King" - Story and Game Designer, Lead Artist
- James "Undertakers" - Additional Artist
